code: import{AXIOS,uploadFile}from'./endpoints';export function readSystemStatus(timeout){return AXIOS.get('/systemStatus',{timeout:timeout});}export function restart(){return AXIOS.post('/restart');}export function factoryReset(){return AXIOS.post('/factoryReset');}export function readOTASettings(){return AXIOS.get('/otaSettings');}export function updateOTASettings(otaSettings){return AXIOS.post('/otaSettings',otaSettings);}export var uploadFirmware=function uploadFirmware(file,config){return uploadFile('/uploadFirmware',file,config);};
